sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtnsynchrnserverinfo ( SERVER_ID /* */ , SERVER_NM /* */ , SERVER_IP /* */ , SERVER_PORT /* */ , FTP_ID /* */ , FTP_PASSWORD /* */ , SYNCHRN_LC /* */ , REFLCT_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #serverId# /* */ , #serverNm# /* */ , #serverIp# /* */ , #serverPort# /* */ , #ftpId# /* */ , #ftpPassword# /* */ , #synchrnLc# /* */ , #reflctAt# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtnsynchrnserverinfo SET SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */ , SERVER_NM=#serverNm# /* */ , SERVER_IP=#serverIp# /* */ , SERVER_PORT=#serverPort# /* */ , FTP_ID=#ftpId# /* */ , FTP_PASSWORD=#ftpPassword# /* */ , SYNCHRN_LC=#synchrnLc# /* */ , REFLCT_AT=#reflctAt# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT SERVER_ID /* */ , SERVER_NM /* */ , SERVER_IP /* */ , SERVER_PORT /* */ , FTP_ID /* */ , FTP_PASSWORD /* */ , SYNCHRN_LC /* */ , REFLCT_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnsynchrnserverinfo WHERE SERVER_ID=#serverId# /* */

SELECT SERVER_ID /* */ , SERVER_NM /* */ , SERVER_IP /* */ , SERVER_PORT /* */ , FTP_ID /* */ , FTP_PASSWORD /* */ , SYNCHRN_LC /* */ , REFLCT_AT /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtnsynchrnserverinfo WHERE 1=1
SERVER_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SERVER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY SERVER_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtnsynchrnserverinfo WHERE 1=1
SERVER_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
SERVER_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
